name: Michael Dovhalov
greeting: Hey there! Thank you for visiting my portfolio page. It has been fully designed and developed by me
description:
I am a hardworking and motivated developer. My main focus is
backend development but my experience also includes frontend
and devops areas

jobs.description: A crypto-oriented banking application. Bitcoin Suisse leads the market in cryptocurrency investments, offering institutional brokerage services, custody solutions, staking, and secured loans, alongside cutting-edge technical developments. With over 300 employees, Bitcoin Suisse maintains its position as a Swiss pioneer in the crypto industry.

highlights.title: Technical Contributions Highlights:
bullets: Developed a clustered microservice capable of handling hundreds of thousands of requests per second with below second latency, significantly enhancing backend reliability and performance

Solved dozens of different problems, including security,performance,processing of huge data streams, making efficient architectural decisions and improving the quality and functionality of the product
Made a major contribution to CI/CD automating the deployment of microservices in a cluster, greatly accelerating the speed and efficiency of product development

Skills and Tech: C#, ASP.NET, React.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, Blazor, Kafka, Azure, MicrosoftSQL, Docker, Kubernetes, Grafana, Azure Pipeline, Microsoft Orleans, k6, Restful API, Postman, Git, Azure DevOps, web applications

jobs.description: Developed integrations with other systems, cloud integration, backend for client-facing frontend, authorization mechanisms, integration tests, ci/cd pipelines, etc. upSWOT is a fintech startup offering customizable embedded finance widgets and actionable insights for businesses. Trusted by 100+ multinational financial institutions and partnered with industry leaders like Mastercard, Visa, NCR, NerdW

highlights.title: Product Team Highlights:
bullets: Developed multi-tenant SaaS accommodating hundreds of parallel tenants per application instance, exceeding gigabyte-scale throughput
Led backend development in the team, onboarded and mentored 3 newcomers to the team, allowing them to quickly get up to speed on work processes
Identified and fixed over 25+ potential vulnerabilities, enhancing product security for penetration testing and SOC2 certification
Integrated with more than 10 partners solutions using Rest API, OAuth, OIDC, and SAML significantly expanding the innovative functionality of the product with strict performance requirements
Repeatedly took initiative by making improvements to scrum processes improving the process and efficiency of development within the team

Skills and Tech: C#, SQL, ASP.NET, MySQL, MongoDB, Kafka, Redis, Docker, Kubernetes, GitLab ci/cd, Websockets, OAuth, SAML, Clickhouse, Grafana, JavaScript, REST Web Services, Postman, Linux, Google Cloud, ADO.NET, JIRA, NoSQL, business development, test-driven production code, GitFlow, PostgreSQL

highlights.title: Customer-Support Team Highlights:
bullets: Engaged in dozens of client calls and supported client environments to provide technical expertise and recommend optimal integration solutions, successfully executing contracts and significantly increasing company revenue through successful deals
Prepared and presented workflow, deployment, architecture, use-case sequence, and data-flow diagrams to help partners understand technical processes
